ygData.subject: Re: an Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: I decided to check out the theory about where does this light lead. I asked the same question, and got the same responses. However, I also got the sams
ygData.messageBody:
I decided to check out the theory about where does this light lead. I asked
the same question, and got the same responses. However, I also got the sams
response when I said, "Where Leader." Which can only mean that the guide
system works by picking up word fragments instead of exact words, so it
percievs Where does this light lead, to, Where Leader, by picking out WHERE do
es this light LEAD. Jus though I'd share my revelation and be of some help.
